name: .IADPAGE File Extension
summary: Learn about .IADPAGE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Page template used by iAd Producer, an application for designing and assembling rich interactive content for iOS advertisements; contains files that make up a page template, which may include assets, banners, splash pages, styles, layers, user data, and metadata.

content: The IADPAGE file allows you to access pre-built pages and import their own assets and change settings such as transition colors, product URLs, and product details. The template helps you save time by giving you the layout you need without requiring you to design it from scratch.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
